sentences.en: A rigid routine can be stultifying and boring.
sentences.cn: 刻板单调的生活会让人觉得无聊乏味。

sentences.en: a routine operation
sentences.cn: 常规操作

sentences.en: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.cn: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.en: Family holidays are meant to be a break from routine.
sentences.cn: 家庭假日就是从平淡的日常生活中解脱一下。

sentences.en: He continued to mow the lawn and do other routine chores.
sentences.cn: 他继续剪草坪，并做些其他日常杂务。

sentences.en: He is especially emphatic about the value of a precise routine.
sentences.cn: 他特别强调严格按程序走的意义。

sentences.en: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
sentences.cn: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。

sentences.en: It amazed him how easily one could slip into a routine.
sentences.cn: 他惊异地发现人很容易在不知不觉中因循守旧起来。

sentences.en: Jack had attended these meetings as a matter of routine for years.
sentences.cn: 数年来，杰克把参加这些会议当成是例行公事。

sentences.en: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.cn: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.en: John’s departure had upset their daily routine.
sentences.cn: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.en: my daily exercise routine
sentences.cn: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.en: routine maintenance work
sentences.cn: 例行的维修工作

sentences.en: Routine physicals are done by a nurse.
sentences.cn: 由一名护士做常规体检。

sentences.en: She was bored with the deadening routine of her life.
sentences.cn: 她厌倦了自己生活令人窒息的一成不变。

sentences.en: So many days are routine and uninteresting, especially in winter.
sentences.cn: 许多日子都过得平淡乏味，尤其是在冬天。

sentences.en: The disease was detected during a routine check-up.
sentences.cn: 这个病是在做常规体检时查出来的。

sentences.en: They enjoy anything that breaks the dullness of their routine life.
sentences.cn: 只要能打破他们日常刻板、沉闷的生活，任何事情他们都喜欢。

sentences.en: They found invasive cancer during a routine examination.
sentences.cn: 他们在常规体检中发现了扩散性的癌变。

sentences.en: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.cn: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.en: Vets' fees can be considerable, even for routine visits.
sentences.cn: 即使是常规检查，兽医的收费也会相当高。

sentences.en: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.cn: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

sentences.en: You will need to have a routine biannual examination.
sentences.cn: 你得接受一年两次的例行检查。

words.tran_cn: 职员；墨守成规者；[通信] 定期测试装置

phrases.tran_cn: 例行检查；常规检查；日常检验
定期试验；常规试验；例行程序试验；定期测验

trans.tran_cn: 常规的，日常的，平常的，乏味的
trans.tran_en: happening as a normal part of a job or process

trans.tran_cn: 惯例，常规，例程，生活乏味，一套动作
trans.tran_en: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
